question: Who is the head of the CBDT panel to help bring down tax litigation?
explanation: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has formed a four-member committee  to look into the matter of taxation related pain points and submit its final report and recommendations by mid-March 2019. Its recommendations could include applying a filter for tax officer before a notice is issued and setting a time limit for concluding an investigation. The committee is head by income tax commissioner Sanjeev Sharma.
